def read_int():
    return int(input())


def read_ints():
    return list(map(int, input().split(' ')))


t = read_int()
for case_num in range(t):
    n = read_int()
    a = list(read_ints())
    a.sort()
    ans = int(1e9)
    for i in range(n - 1):
        ans = min(ans, abs(a[i] - a[i + 1]))
    print(ans)

def r1(t):
    return t(input())

def r2(t):
    return [t(i) for i in input().split()]


for zzz in range(r1(int)):
    n = r1(int)
    s = r2(int)
    s.sort()
    ans = s[-1] - s[0]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        ans = min(ans, s[i + 1] - s[i])
    print(ans)

def solve():
  #n, m = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
  n = int(input())
  a = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
  a.sort()
  md = 10000
  for i in range(n-1):
    md = min(a[i+1]-a[i],md)

  return md


for t in range(int(input())):
  print(solve())
